TaxonIdentification.subspecies_name: 寸草 ( 原亚种) cun cao (yuan ya zhong)

treatment.description: Leaf blades linear-involute. Female glumes ferruginous-brown, white hyaline on margins.
treatment.distribution: Grasslands, slopes, wet places on riverbanks, roadsides; 200–700 m. Gansu, Heilongjiang, Jilin, Liaoning, Nei Mongol [Kazakhstan, Korea, E Mongolia, New Guinea, Russia (Far East, Siberia); North America].
